transcripts.text: Well, as the election approaches in November, we're starting to get an idea of what will shape Joe Biden's campaign over the coming months. So, and this is a quote from him on The Daily Show.  Well, they're related.  And this follows his greatest concern.  He said, it's my greatest concern, my single greatest concern.  And that is that Donald Trump will steal the election.  Bill Whittle, let's start there before we get into the second greatest concern. You know, you always tell yourself, this surely must be the bottom, right?  You just can't conceive of anything lower than this. So if the election hasn't occurred yet and the results are already being called into question, you can rest assured what the narrative will be on the first Wednesday in November.  And this is the most disgraceful thing I think I've ever heard from a presidential candidate.

Do you remember that?

It depends on whether or not there was rampant boat stealing. I never cease to be amazed by it, but once I hear it, I understand how they work.
